briefdescription.para: Returns a list of all connected readers.

parameterdescription.para: Probably should be an empty list.

briefdescription.para: Causes the reader to emit the PASS beep.
Causes the reader to emit the FAIL beep.
Reads a packet from a reader into a buffer.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct reader *reader, char *tx_packet, int tx_packet_len, char *rx_buf, int rx_buf_len, int *payload_index)
memberdef.name: reader_txPacketRxReply

memberdef.argsstring: (struct reader *reader, struct list *tagList, char *packetPayload, int packetPayload_len)
memberdef.name: reader_parse_poll_packet

briefdescription.para: Parses a packet returned from a reader poll.
Causes the reader to poll for and ISO15693 tag.
Attempts to poll the reader for various tags.

detaileddescription.para: Device library for an RFID reader. Particularly the DLP-RFID1.
